licence_overview:
To run a residential care home you must be registered with the [Health and Social Care Regulation and Quality Improvement Authority (RQIA).](http://www.rqia.org.uk/home/index.cfm "Health and Social Care Regulation and Quality Improvement Authority (RQIA)"){:rel="external"}

You are deemed to be running a residential care home if you run an establishment that provides residential accommodation with board and personal care for people in need of personal care due to:

* old age and infirmity
* disablement
* dependence on alcohol or drugs
* mental disorder
licence_short_description: Register with the Health and Social Care Regulation and Quality Improvement Authority (RQIA) in Northern Ireland to run a residential care home.
